    Date: 2017/03/25 Time: 2:42 PM
    SqlgRestrictPropertiesStrategy
    Restricts the set of properties to read for a given vertex or edge, if we determine that we don't need them all for the rest of the traversal
    SqlgSelectOneStepStrategy
    This strategy will look for SelectOneStep followed by a PropertyMap step, i.e. `.select('x').values('y')` as a localChild If it finds it and the ReplacedStep already has retricted properties then it will append the values label to the restricted properties of the `SqlgGraphStep` or `SqlgVertexStep`

    SqlgUnionPathStrategy
    Rewrites union followed by path.
    SqlgWhereStrategy
    When a Where step uses a FullText, ArrayContains or ArrayOverlaps predicate, we attach it to the step itself as a special hasContainer
